#summary Getting started with creating Jaspersoft reports with Google BigQuery Data Source.Note: New users should start with this page.

= Installing and configuring Jaspersoft !BigQuery Connector =

* Activating Google !BigQuery Service*
* Download Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector*
* Installing Jaspersoft !BigQuery Plugin for iReport*
* Creating a report in iReport*

= Details =

==* Activating Google !BigQuery Service==
See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ActivatingBigQueryService Activating Google BigQuery Service] for details.

Note:
Existing !BigQuery users may skip 'Sign up for !BigQuery Service' section in the above link but are adviced to refer to 'Generate API Access ID' subsection for instructions on the properties needed for establishing a Jaspersoft-!BigQuery Datasource connection.

==*2. Download Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector*==
Download the following files from the project [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/].

The following files are included:
  * jrs-bigquery-0.0.2
  * Jaspersoft-iReport-!BigQueryPlugin-0.0.2
  * js-bigquery-datasource-0.0.2

==*3. Installing Jaspersoft !BigQuery Plugin for iReport*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ConfiguringiReport Configuring iReport] for details.

==*4. Creating a report in iReport*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ReportCreation Creating a JasperReport] for details.

==*5. Deploying Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector to !JasperReports Server*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ConfiguringJasperReportsServer Configuring JasperReports Server] for details.  

==*6. Publishing a Report*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/PublishReport Publishing a Report] for details.
